A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Never has a movie split my soul in two. It's been three days since I've seen it. Twice on one day. I still don't know if I love it or if I hate it. I love the visuals\, the OST and the acting of the lead roles. Carrie Fisher in specific\, I found her acting in TFA a little awkward\, but in TLJ she's back at it. I hated a few scenes\, some storylines\, the fact they ruined some other storylines which had a great potential.
It's hard to review this movie without spoiling. It really is.
Just go and see it. It is not bad. Is it great? Maybe. Maybe not. I'm still not sure.
Thanks.
